page.title: 13 The Castle Grounds.
page.content: The Castle Grounds lie between the two Rivers, Anker and Tame. {Facilities} are provided for football, tennis, boating, fishing, bowls and putting. There is also a swimming pool complex with two pools. Both {indoor and outdoor pools} attract over a quarter of a million visitors every year. The open air pool is only open for a short Summer Season. The twenty-five metre indoor pool is opn throughout the year and has a gallery with two hundred seats. There is also a sauna suite and solarium.
